sentences.en: A prosperity never seen before appeared in the countryside.
sentences.cn: 农村出现了前所未有的繁荣.

sentences.en: A sound forest economy promotes the prosperity of agriculture and rural life.
sentences.cn: 完善的森林经济可以促进农业和农村生活的兴旺与繁荣.

sentences.en: Britain is not enjoying such prosperity as it was in the mid-1980s.
sentences.cn: 英国现在已经不像20世纪80年代中期那么繁荣昌盛。

sentences.en: Hong Kong's prosperity relies heavily on foreign businesses.
sentences.cn: 香港的繁荣在很大程度上依赖于外国商行.

sentences.en: Hong Kong's prosperity relies heavily on mainland.
sentences.cn: 香港的繁荣在很大程度上依赖于大陆.

sentences.en: I wish you the life of happiness and prosperity.
sentences.cn: 我祝你生活幸福、万事如意.

sentences.en: In prosperity our friends know us; in adversity we know our friends.--John Churton
sentences.cn: 得意时，朋友识我；失意时，我识朋友。

sentences.en: Prosperity and economic success remain popular and broadly shared goals.
sentences.cn: 经济繁荣昌盛一直是各国普遍追求的共同目标。

sentences.en: The day is not far off when China will attain prosperity.
sentences.cn: 中国的兴盛是可以计日程功的.

sentences.en: The new agreement raised hopes for conditions of prosperity and harmony.
sentences.cn: 新的协议唤起了人们对繁荣与和谐前景的期望.

sentences.en: The new agreement raised their hopes for conditions of prosperity and harmony.
sentences.cn: 新的协议唤起了他们对繁荣和谐前景的期望.

sentences.en: The town's nineteenth-century prosperity was built on steel.
sentences.cn: 这个城市19世纪的繁荣是建立在钢铁工业基础上的。

sentences.en: Under the rule of Britain, the prosperity of the island increased considerably.
sentences.cn: 在英国统治下, 该岛的繁荣程度大为提高.

sentences.en: We wish your country prosperity and her people happiness.
sentences.cn: 祝贵国繁荣昌盛,人民幸福.

sentences.en: With success and prosperity, John was finally able to ease off.
sentences.cn: (事业)成功之后, 约翰终于能够轻松些了.

trans.tran_en: when people have money and everything that is needed for a good life
